Is the Main Protagonist of [[eotoq]] and the First monarch to unite all of [[Loreteia]] and the founding Empress that of [[The Empire]].

# Equipment
* [[Ordinary Quill]] - Using the artefact of the [[White God]], Euphemia became a powerful Assassin Illusionist, a powerful Warrior Mage, and a Wise but Ruthless Monarch.
